trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class exception is thrown when an underlying directory operation fails.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class, using the specified serialization information and streaming context.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and an underlying exception object.
A message that describes the error.
An <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> object that contains underlying exception information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a specified error code.
A message that describes the error.
An error code that identifies the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> class with a specified error message, an underlying exception object, and a specified error code.
A message that describes the error.
An <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> object that contains underlying exception information.
An error code that identifies the error.
Gets the error code for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryOperationException"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> value that identifies the error.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with information about the exception.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
